details.description_text: 🔭 Product Name: Astronaut Galaxy Projector🌌 Function: Starry sky projection with nebula effect🎮 Control Method: Remote-controlled + Manual buttons🎨 Lighting Modes: Multiple color options & effects (RGB nebula + stars)🕒 Timer Function: Auto-off after 45 or 90 minutes🔄 Rotation Feature: 360° rotating nebula projection🚀 Design: Cute astronaut shape with detachable base💤 Best For: Bedroom lighting, night light, relaxation, kids' room, romantic setup🔌 Power Source: USB poweredProduct details of Astronaut Galaxy Projector – Remote-Controlled Starry Night Light Unique Astronaut Design The astronaut projector features a creatively designed magnetic head that adjusts easily to project across your room. The high-definition lens guarantees crisp, stunning visuals. Its adorable design also makes it a perfect decorative piece for kids’ rooms. 17 Lighting Modes to Choose From Enjoy 8 mesmerizing nebula effects and vibrant green starlights. You can customize your experience by combining nebula and star projections — offering a total of 17 stunning modes to suit any mood! Remote Control & Built-In Timer Control your galaxy with ease! Adjust brightness, colors, and rotation speed, or set the automatic sleep timer for 45 or 90 minutes — all from the comfort of your bed using the included remote. Perfect Gift for All Ages Whether it’s for a child fascinated by space, a teen who loves Star Wars, or even an adult seeking a peaceful atmosphere, this Astronaut Projector is the perfect surprise for birthdays, Christmas, anniversaries, or simply room decor upgrades. Quality Assurance We care deeply about your satisfaction. SigmaClub ensures that each Astronaut Galaxy Light is backed by our 6-month guarantee, so you can shop with complete peace of mind.

details.description_text: DescriptionTP-Link TL-WR840N 300Mbps Wireless RouterThe 300Mbps Wireless N Router TL-WR840N V2 is a combined wired/wireless network connection device designed specifically for small business and home office networking requirements. The TL-WR840N V2 creates an exceptional and advanced wireless performance, making it ideal for streaming HD video, VoIP and online gaming. Also, Wi-Fi Protected Setup (WPS) button on the sleek and fashionable exterior ensures WPA2 encryption, preventing the network from outside intrusions. TP-LINK's TL-WR840N is a high speed solution that is compatible with IEEE 802.11b/g/n. Based on 802.11n technology, TL-WR840N V2 gives users wireless performance at up to 300Mbps, which can meet your most demanding home networking needs, such as HD streaming, online gaming and large files downloading. 1 Yrs TP-Link Warranty and fashionable exterior ensures WPA2 encryption, preventing the network from outside intrusions.DescriptionTP-Link TL-WR840N 300Mbps Wireless RouterThe 300Mbps Wireless N Router TL-WR840N V2 is a combined wired/wireless network connection device designed specifically for small business and home office networking requirements. 541498506.name: Smart Remote Control Motor Forward and Reverse Two-Way Remote Control for Electric Curtains and Projection Screen

details.description_text: Clearing methodAfter ensuring that the cord is correctly connected, the -on LED is always off, the "□" button for more than 8SThe LED light flashes twice and the buzzer sounds twice, then the code clearing is completed Smart Remote Control Motor Forward and Reverse Two-Way Remote Control for Electric Curtains and Projection Screen Remote control pairing instructionsClearing methodAfter ensuring that the cord is correctly connected, the -on LED is always off, the "□" button for more than 8SThe LED light flashes twice and the buzzer sounds twice, then the code clearing is completedNote: After clearing, the remote control that has been previously learned and paired no longer be controlledPairing method: and hold the "△" button on the controller for more than 4S, the LED light is always on, release the learning button and the "△" button on the remote control at the same time, wait until the LED light flashes twice and the buzzer sounds twice, then the "△" key learning is completed; then and hold the "▽" button on the controller for more than 4S, the LED light is always on, release the learning button and the "▽" button on the remote control at the same time, wait until the LED light flashes twice and the buzzer sounds twice, then the "▽" key learning is completed.Note for women: 1. The "△" key and "▽" key are learned separately; the "□" key can be controlled without learning;2. After powering on, the LED indicator light is always off. Regardless of manual or remote control operation, the LED light flashes once and the buzzer sounds once. The manual function and remote control function are controlled in conjunction with each other.Color: As ShownMaterial: plasticPackage Contents:1 * Remote control1 * ControllerOnly the above package content, other products are not included.Note: Light reflection and different displays may cause the color of the item in the picture a little different from the thing. 160194372.name: HDMI Digital Audio Decoder HDMI TO HDMI TV Audio + VGA + SPDIF 5.1CH HP Converter Adapter US - US

details.description_text: Plug Type: US Color: Black DC5V/1A power adapter High tone quality, low noise Support CEC and HDCP Brand new and high quality Save your Money Best Choice and best discounts Customer Care is Our Top Priority Offer is Subject to Availability Big Sale Package Included: 1 x HDMI Digital Audio HDMI to HDMI + VGA + SPDIF 5.1CH HP DTS Adapter 1 x Power Adapter 1 x English user manual With 1x HDMI input and 1x HDMI output.1x VGA analog video sync output, 1x SPDIF optical digital audio and 6 channel RCA analog audio output that can connect with the amplifier or the TV directly. Features: 1.Model:51S 2.Brand new and high quality. 3.MHL/HDMI working in dual mode, support audio and video input in MHL mode, and can charge for MHL equipment. 4.Support HDMI input up to 1080P/60Hz, supports 3D (24/30fs). 5.Support CEC and HDCP. 6.Supports 3 modes of EDID management for audio formats, can switch among built-in EDID (2CH/5.1CH) and external EDID (TV). 7.Uses 24 bit/96KHz audio DSP and 24bit /192KHz DAC. 8.Support digital audio formats: Dolby digital (AC3), DTS, LPCM, automatic identification signal format. 9.VGA output resolution format with the input format automatically changes. 10.Headphone amplifier output, can drive the general 3.5mm earphone. 11.High tone quality, low noise. 12.DC5V/1A power adapter . Features of the interface: 1.SWITCH: Audio EDID mode switch. This switch allows users to select the source's audio EDID. 2.PASS: HDMI pass mode. Switch to PASS mode for the HDMI source to output audio per the EDID of connected TV or AV receiver, supports up to LPCM 7.1 channels. 3.2CH: 2CH LPCM mode. Switch to 2CH mode for the HDMI source to output LPCM 2 channels audio per the built-in EDID. Then HDMI, SPDIF, RCA and headphones output stereo audio. 4.5.1CH: 5.1CH bitstream Mode. Switch to B5.1CH mode for the HDMI source to output bitstream audio per the built-in EDID. Then HDMI, SPDIF and RCA output 5.1CH audio, headphone output from FL and FR channel. Operation and connection: 1.Connect one HDMI cable from a DVD/Blu-ray player into input port of decoder. 2.Connect one HDMI/VGA cable from TV/Monitor into output port of decoder. 3.If you need a digital audio, connect one optical fiber from digital power amplifier into the SPDIF output port of decoder. 4.If you need an analog audio, Connect six AV cables from analog power amplifier into the analog audio output ports of decoder, the channel must correspond. If the connected TV or stereo power amplifier, connect the FL/FR two channel only, and switch EDID mode in 2CH. 5.If you need to use the headphone output, pls switch EDID mode in 2CH. 6.Connect 5V power supply to the decoder and inserted into the power socket. 7.VGA output resolution format with the input format automatically changes. Support resolution formats as follows: 720×480-60Hz(480P),800×600-60Hz, 1024×768-60Hz, 1152×864-60Hz, 1280×720-60Hz(720P), 1280×768-60Hz, 1280×800-60Hz, 1280×960-60Hz, 1280×1024-60Hz, 1360×768-60Hz, 1366×768-60Hz, 1440×900-60Hz, 1600×900-60Hz, 1600×1200-60Hz, 1680×1050-60Hz, 1920×1080-60Hz(1080P). HighqualityandInexpensiveExquisiteWorkmanshipDurable in useWellMadeEnjoyGreatPopularityAmongthePeopleSaveyourMoney

148434294.name: VGA SVGA to HDMI Output 1080P HD Audio TV AV HDTV Video Cable Converter Adapter -

details.description_text: Color: Black Voltage: 5V 1A Output: HDMI(Type A 19pin Female) Input: VGA (DB15 Male)and Audio(3.5mm Audio Jack) Device Type: VGA + Audio To HDMI Converter Adapter Brand new and high quality Features 1. VGA analog video + analog audio signal input ; standard HDMI digital signal output. 2. Supports VGA video input: VGA, XGA, SVGA, SXGA, UGA. 3. Convert analog signal( VGA ) to digital signal ( HDMI ). The audio is coupled with the VGA video signal, then audio and video are both converted to HDMI format. 4. HDMI output : support up to 1080P / 60Hz ( output and input format synchronization, frequency synchronization). 5. It applied to the desktop computer, laptop, DVD, Set TOP Box, player and so on VGA signal resource input. 6. Easy to install, no need to driver plug an play. 7. Need external power source, the operating current: 170mA, the universal USB cable supply to demand normal work. How to Use 1. Insert the VGA interface into the computer or other equipment with the VGA output. Please check VGA signal output well. 2. Plug the USB cable connector into USB port to be offered power. 3. Plug 3.5mm audio connector into audio port. 4. Insert other connector into the HDMI cable, and then connect the HDMI cable to the displayer and the projector device with the HDMI interface. 5. Play the video, PPT and documentation, the image will display on the screen of the other display device. Specification 1. Device Type: VGA + Audio To HDMI Converter Adapter 2. Input: VGA (DB15 Male)and Audio(3.5mm Audio Jack) 3. Output: HDMI(Type A 19pin Female) 4. VGA Resolution: 480i/576i/480p/576p/720p/1080i/1080p 5. HDMI Resolution: 480i/576i/480p/576p/720p/1080i/1080p 6. Voltage: 5V 1A 7. Support System: Windows 2000/XP/win7/win8/win10, Mac OS X and so on Important : converter is NOT bi-directional. It only converts from VGA to HDMI. This converter can not be used between the desktop with VGA and laptop with HDMI, as both of them are output signal so it will do not display! Package Includes 1 x VGA + Audio To HDMI Converter Adapter. 1 x USB Cable.

details.description_text: Clearing methodAfter ensuring that the cord is correctly connected, the -on LED is always off, the "□" button for more than 8SThe LED light flashes twice and the buzzer sounds twice, then the code clearing is completed Remote control pairing instructionsClearing methodAfter ensuring that the cord is correctly connected, the -on LED is always off, the "□" button for more than 8SThe LED light flashes twice and the buzzer sounds twice, then the code clearing is completedNote: After clearing, the remote control that has been previously learned and paired no longer be controlledPairing method: and hold the "△" button on the controller for more than 4S, the LED light is always on, release the learning button and the "△" button on the remote control at the same time, wait until the LED light flashes twice and the buzzer sounds twice, then the "△" key learning is completed; then and hold the "▽" button on the controller for more than 4S, the LED light is always on, release the learning button and the "▽" button on the remote control at the same time, wait until the LED light flashes twice and the buzzer sounds twice, then the "▽" key learning is completed.Note for women: 1. The "△" key and "▽" key are learned separately; the "□" key can be controlled without learning;2. After powering on, the LED indicator light is always off. Regardless of manual or remote control operation, the LED light flashes once and the buzzer sounds once. The manual function and remote control function are controlled in conjunction with each other.Color: As ShownMaterial: plasticPackage Contents:1 * Remote control1 * ControllerOnly the above package content, other products are not included.Note: Light reflection and different displays may cause the color of the item in the picture a little different from the thing.
